an4.34:1.3: Yavata, bhikkhave, satta apada va dvipada va catuppada va bahuppada va rupino va arupino va sannino va asannino va nevasanninasannino va, tathagato tesam aggamakkhayati araham sammasambuddho.
an4.34:1.4: Ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasanna, agge te pasanna.
an4.34:1.5: Agge kho pana pasannanam aggo vipako hoti.
an4.34:2.1: Yavata, bhikkhave, dhamma sankhata, ariyo atthangiko maggo tesam aggamakkhayati.
an4.34:2.2: Ye, bhikkhave, ariye atthangike magge pasanna, agge te pasanna.
an4.34:2.3: Agge kho pana pasannanam aggo vipako hoti.
an4.34:3.1: Yavata, bhikkhave, dhamma sankhata va asankhata va, virago tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam madanimmadano pipasavinayo alayasamugghato vattupacchedo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
an4.34:3.2: Ye, bhikkhave, virage dhamme pasanna, agge te pasanna.
an4.34:3.3: Agge kho pana pasannanam aggo vipako hoti.
an4.34:4.1: Yavata, bhikkhave, sangha va gana va, tathagatasavakasangho tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam cattari purisayugani attha purisapuggala esa bhagavato savakasangho ahuneyyo pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an4.34:4.2: Ye, bhikkhave, sanghe pasanna, agge te pasanna.
an4.34:4.3: Agge kho pana pasannanam aggo vipako hoti.
